extensionDescription.message: Bulk close tabs with matching URLs or names.

close-button.description: action button to do the closing

closeButtonTooltip.description: instruction on inline single tab close button

notFoundAlert.description: indicates that no matching tabs were found

pinnedTabsNote.description: highlights that some tabs were not selected due to pin settings.

pinnedTabsWarning.description: highlights that pinned tabs will be closed due to pin settings.

main-tab-url.description: The main tab selecting the URL search method.

main-tab-title.description: The main tab selecting the Title search method.

main-tab-duplicates.description: The main tab selecting the Duplicate search method.

search-query-prompt.description: The prompt for the search query.

case-sensitive-title-match-label.description: The form label asking if matches should be case sensitive.

all-windows-match-label.description: Query asking to search all windows (active) or just the current window

dont-close-pinned-tabs.description: query if pinned tabs should be closed (if pin settings is ask)

dont-close-current-tab.description: query if current tab should be closed if it matches search

no-duplicates-found.description: Report indicating no duplicates found to close.

unicode-failure-warning-prefix.message: I'm trying to match unicode searches and suggestions.  If its not working for you please
unicode-failure-warning-prefix.description: link to issues because the unicode stuff is probably broken (text before link).

unicode-failure-warning-link-text.description: link to issues because the unicode stuff is probably broken (the link text).

unicode-failure-warning-suffix.description: link to issues because the unicode stuff is probably broken (text after the link text).

matched-summary-prefix.description: Summarise the result of the query (before the match count).

matched-summary-suffix.description: Summarise the result of the query (after the match count).

option-close-pinned-tabs-value-ask.description: option to show check-box to choose pinned handling.

option-close-pinned-tabs-value-preserve.description: option to always ignore pinned tabs (preserve them).

option-close-pinned-tabs-value-close.description: option to always allow closing of pinned tabs if the search critera match.
